products.name: Air force One White
products.description: Airforce 1 is made of high quality leather and natural  rubber .The shoes have a spongy lining  and a cotton innersole on the inside which ensures maximum comfort and freshness even in all weather conditions . Their sole is well designedto give the shoes both a classic look and also ensure maximum grip even on slipperly surfaces. The shoes are easy to clean as they are made of smooth non dirt leather.

products.name: Sb dunk
products.description: The shoes display a prominent Nike swoosh emblem on the sides, with blue detailing on the laces, tongue, and outsole. They are placed on a dark surface, possibly in a retail setting, with shoe boxes and additional packing materials visible in the background.

products.name: Jordan 3 Cool Grey
products.description: The Air Jordan 3 Retro SE, a beloved classic, combines style and performance. Its design pays homage to the original Air Jordan 3, known for its iconic elephant print overlays and visible Air cushioning. With a mix of premium materials like leather and suede, the Retro SE offers durability and luxury. The mid-top silhouette provides ankle support while allowing for freedom of movement. Whether you're hitting the court or the streets, the Air Jordan 3 Retro SE promises comfort, style, and a nod to basketball heritage

products.name: Brown Timber Land
products.description: THE original waterproof boot. This all-season style gives you tireless waterproof performance and instantly recognizable work-boot styling. Other essential features include 400 grams of warm, down-free PrimaLoft® insulation, a padded collar for a comfortable fit around the ankle, and a rubber lug outsole for traction. They're responsibly made, too, with eco-conscious leather uppers and ReBOTL™ leather lining. Timberland supports responsible manufacturing of leather through the Leather Working Group.

products.name: J4 Grey Black
products.description: The Air Jordan 4 GREY/BLACK  is a colorway of the iconic Air Jordan 4 silhouette. It features a GREY leather upper with tonal nubuck and mesh accents. The shoe also features a military black color on the eyelets, heel tab and outsole. The iconic plastic netting on the sides and the Air cushioning in the sole provide both style and comfort. The Jumpman logo is featured on the tongue and heel.

products.name: J3 Retro
products.description: The Air Jordan 3 Retro SE White Dark Brown Green is the perfect shoe for any sneakerhead. This classic silhouette features a white leather upper with dark brown and green accents for a timeless look. The classic design features a visible Air unit in the heel for cushioning and a durable rubber outsole for traction. The perforated detailing on the toe box provides breathability, while the padded tongue and collar provide comfort and support. With a timeless design and iconic style, the Air Jordan 3 Retro SE White Dark Brown Green is a must-have for any sneakerhead.
